#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int N = 1e5 + 5;
const double pi = 3.14;
const long long int inf = 1e15;
int tt;
int n;
int b;

inline int gcd(int x, int y){
    return((!y)? x: gcd(y,x%y));
}

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    cin >> tt;
    while(tt--){
        cin >> n >> b;
        int g = gcd(n,b);
        long long lcm = (1LL * n * b ) / g;
        cout << g << " " << lcm << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
